title: Level 5 Mastery chamion disappeared from profile
body:
Hi

I just achieved level 5 on Vel'Koz, which would mean he would be my fourth 'most-mastery-achieved' champion. Vel'Koz has had that rank for a while on my profile, but now that I have level 5 on him he disappeared from the 'top champions' and 'in progress' board. When I look him up at the 'all champions' page it does show the red ribbon; he just disappeared from my profile. Anyone else having this bug?

replies.body: This is working as intended!  Your profile page will show the top 3 highest mastery champions as well as the ones you're "in-progress" of mastering (aka level 5 mastery), sorted by highest mastery points.

I will argue this isn't good design, as we cannot show off our whole list of mastery 5s, and any champs that aren't my top 3 (I have 7 mastery 5s), They cannot see my mastery on 4 of them in any way, and I really dislike this.

when you are interested in your champion masteries or those of other players, you can find them on this (not really beautiful but working) site:

http://championmasterylookup-derpthemeus.rhcloud.com/
